title: Stuck reconnecting a game that is non-existent.
body: So I was in a normal game that was just about to end until I abruptly d/ced at 7:03am AEDT. I checked later to realise that there was a scheduled maintenance and I decided to come back an hour later. At around 8am I logged on again, only to see the loading screen telling me to reconnect to the game. However, the game is just simply non-existent. I checked my character on op.gg and I am not in a game at all, even though other people in my friends list told me I was. The problem is still persisting and I would like to exit this game that I am not even in. Any ideas on how to resolve this issue?

replies.body: wake up and fix the problem plz riot .... what the hell is this slowest situation solve ability
same here nothing seems to be working
i submitted to ticket to riot ill see what they say
Well I tried repairing the client and it had no effect. So that's one option out of the door.
Trying to work it out myself ill let you know if i have any ideas lol
problem fixed by itself for me also
Problem here fixed for me. Didn't do anything, just fixed itself
i just fixed it ran as admin then switched to legacy client hope this helps
